content: crochet these knit-like coasters using the half_double_crochet in the third loop only stitch this simple stitch creates a knit-like texture that adds visual interest and dimension to any project these coasters have an added level of durability with their cork backing but this is an optional step if you love the design of these coasters but want to extend them to make pot holders plant mats or placemats there are instructions provided to help you do this not only do these coasters work up quickly but they use less than 55 yds of yarn which makes them great budget-friendly gifts for friends and family > **buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout ** skill level easy / beginner language english crochet terminology us terms stitches half_double_crochet available sizes 5 - 5 5 in diameter but instructions are provided to customize the size of your coasters to make face pads pot holders or placemats what can you make with this pattern * face pads * coasters * pot holders * plant mats * placemats yarn 100% cotton or cotton blend is recommended the original pattern calls for using worsted weight 4 cotton yarn but you can use any brand or weight as long as you change up the hook size to suit your yarn >**find the free version of the texture swirl coasters here 1 ** other details * uses less than 1 skein of yarn approx 55 yds / coaster * crocheted in the round * designed to be seamless so there is no slip_stitch join at the end of each round * instructions are provided to customize the size of your coaster to make potholders or placemats * cork is added to the base of the coaster to make it more durable but this is optional * the pdf includes the complete written pattern step-by-step pictures and is a total of 9 pages * great one skein or scrap yarn project 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-knit-like-coasters-with-cork-backing/
